body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, county clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Mary B. Thompson Allin on September 11, 1814. Father of William Allin, Henry Allin, George Allin, Sarah Allin, Phillip Allin, Joseph Allin, and Daeress Allin. Clerk of Mercer County Court in Mercer County in 1850. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1850. Clerk of Mercer County Court in Mercer County in 1860. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1860.
